project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to read and parse the CSV file
Create a function to calculate the mean of specified numerical columns
Create a function to calculate the median of specified numerical columns
Create a function to calculate the mode of specified numerical columns
Implement user interaction to specify numerical columns for analysis
Write tests for the functions implemented above (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness
